product_name: Pearl Izumi Infinity Compression Shorts - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The men's Pearl Izumi Infinity Compression Shorts wick away moisture and dry fast as they support your muscles in the gym or outside during fast or long runs. ELITE Transfer nylon/spandex fabric wicks moisture, dries fast and offers UPF 50+ sun protection. Compression shorts can help reduce muscle fatigue. Elasticized waistband has flat-stretch drawcord for unrestricted breathing. Flatlock seams; elasticized hem; reflective accents. Pearl Izumi Infinity Compression Shorts for women have 1 zippered back pocket. Closeout.
short_description: The men's Pearl Izumi Infinity Compression Shorts wick away moisture and dry fast as they support your muscles in the gym or outside during fast or long runs.
